page.title: 06The Police Force in Bourton
page.content: Bourton-on-the-Water is policed by {P.C.Box}and{P.C.Taylor.}Most local people are happy with the policing of the village. The busiest time for the police is at the height of the tourist season.{Theft}is not a big problem, as most of the visitors are in the older age group. The{drug problem}is different to that in a city in that conditions in the{Cotswolds}are ideal for growing cannabis, and outsiders tend to plant it locally and leave it for 6 months before collecting it. {Poaching of deer}is also a problem as venison now fetches high prices. Again, outsiders, especially from Bristol, are responsible. They come at sunrise at weekends with their dogs and guns. The two policemen are often called out by{gamekeepers.}Both Wyck Rissington and Little Rissington are visited daily by the police.
